title: I Read a Book
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 40 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile BR20L
description: The little girl in this book loves to read so much that she reads with every member of her family, including her dog. The book gives practice with high-frequency words and vocabulary while reinforcing the idea that reading is fun and enjoyable.
meta: aunt, brother, dad, dog, grandma, grandpa, mom, read, sister
Use the reading strategy of mentally retelling while reading
Initial Sound : Discriminate initial consonant /r/ sound
Capitalization and Punctuation : Capitalize the first word in sentences and end with appropriate punctuation
Content Vocabulary : Learn content vocabulary for members of a family

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
